title: Romance Guide
content:
Romancing Astarion in Baldur's Gate 3

Players will need to be at the campsite after rescuing the Druid Halsin as well as completing the side quest to save the refugees, then take a long rest. Upon completing this, a celebration for the refugees will be held, players can take this time to go over to Astarion and romance him. players will have to follow these dialog choices:

Really? Saving lives is awful? True, the goblins would have thrown a wilder party. And what's your idea of 'a little fun'?
